Articles.Content: Floor 631- well there seems to be a runaway train coming by .... you should start running now. I really mean it RUN!
Floor 632 - One of the mods (vexx32, specifically) runs after you with a hammer (Sorry vexx32, I couldn't help it)
Floor 363: How did you come back to floor 363? Something doesn't feel right...
Floor 634: After a brief flash of light, you are trans-matted up to this floor.
Floor 635: Quantum electrodynamics lecture by Richard Feynman.

floor 638: "rocking railway rolling rolling on the railway" woo this is very catchy song playing on this floor. (if you don't know where this is from here

)
Floor 639: There's a door. The door opens to 2fort.
Floor 1: Why are you back to the ground? A paradox?
Floor 640 - After a flash, you get transported back to this floor, where I am going to KILL you
Floor 641 : There is a hold-the-line stance where S.A.S soilders are holding off a terrorist rush. Watch out for the rounds wizzing by your head, they might mistake you for a T.
Floor 9001 (IT'S OVER 9000!): You skip a s***load of floors.
Floor 642: there is a sign saying: The above floor is false
Floor 643: There's a sign saying this thread messed up the floor numbers.
Floor 644: You stumble upon a Loonatics Unleashed marathon, you shield your eyes before they burn at the horrifying animations.
Floor #645 you come up to what looks like the roof but then you see more steps to your left leading to no where.
Floor 646 - After climbing the stairs for hours, you reach a Medical Pack with a sign saying "You will need this for the next floor"
Floor 647 - A explosion spontaneously ruptures through the floor, you barely make it in time before the entire floor collapses.

You wonder how the building is still standing for several seconds.

You then see some flint and steel under a sign that reads "You will also need this for the next floor )

you sounder on.
Floor 648 - There is wood blocking your path

[]

Edited August 2, 2019 by CvVtjRtb
Floor 649 - A Black Hole drags you back here
floor 650: You see the devious creator of the show that must not be named.
The creator follows you to floor 651. you then come across several hall ways with a sign saying "all but one will kill you"
floor 652: a floor made entirely out of barbie dolls. you quickly shut the door.
Floor 653: Microgravity.
